sentences.sentence: That would destroy an uncooled chip within a hundredth of a second.
sentences.translation: 这足以让一片没有散热设备的芯片在百分之一秒内被烧毁。

sentences.sentence: Pyroelectric material is one of the key sensitive materials of the uncooled infrared detectors.
sentences.translation: 热释电材料是非制冷红外探测器的关键敏感材料之一。

sentences.sentence: BAE Systems will incorporate its uncooled MicroIR microbolometer sensor technology in the enhanced goggle.
sentences.translation: BAE系统公司将在这种增强型夜视镜中使用该公司的非冷却微型红外微测辐射热仪传感器技术。
